proj.abbi.device

Class DeviceScanActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • proj.abbi.device.DeviceScanActivity

  • public class DeviceScanActivity
extends ListActivity
    This class contains the functions necessary to scan for and list active bluetooth devices in close proximity. The activity also allows for BLE device pairing/ connection.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Create the ActionBar menu and set the visibility of the buttons depending on the current state. - If the application is in idle state - the scan button is visible - Otherwise, the stop button is available

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Trigger a relevant action depending on which ActionBar menu item was interacted with.
        Parameters:
        item - the selected MenuItem is passed as an input parameter
        Returns:

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Ensures Bluetooth is enabled on the device. If Bluetooth is not currently enabled, fire an intent to display a dialog asking the user to grant permission to enable it.

      • onActivityResult

      • onPause

      • onListItemClick

        protected void onListItemClick(ListView l,
                   View v,
                   int position,
                   long id)
        Trigger a call to connectToDevice(BluetoothDevice) if the BluetoothDevice instance is not null.
        Parameters:
        l - the current ListView instance
        v - the current View instance
        position - the position of the selected list item
        id - the selected list item's id
